theHighwayman:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theHighwayman:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theHighwayman:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theHighwayman:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

theHighwayman:MusketPouch.NAME: Musket Pouch
theHighwayman:MusketPouch.FLAVOR: Smell like gunpowder. Taste like metal.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, if you have no Ammo, gain 1 Ammo.

theHighwayman:AmmoBelt.NAME: Cartridge Box
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 3 Paper Cartridges.

theHighwayman:Sheath.NAME: Sharpening Sheath
theHighwayman:Sheath.FLAVOR: Take care of your blades, and they'll take care of you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add Bleed to an enemy, add 1 additional Bleed.

theHighwayman:Holster.NAME: Holster
theHighwayman:Holster.FLAVOR: A trusty home for a trusty gun
DESCRIPTIONS: Always retain all cards that Fire.
